ModMetaData.name: Better autocasting for Vanilla Psycasts Expanded
ModMetaData.description:
Some changes to Vanilla Psycasts Expanded to reduce Micro Management and add functional autocasts.

(Because I'm lazy, this description should always be considered out of date. Mechanics should be explained in-game in the mod settings)

Steal Vitality
 Auto move to target.
 Add sensitivity scaling.
 ~Scaling set to caster sensitivity.~
 Show undrafted.
 Autocasts in this order, Prisoner, Slave, Colonist
Psychic Guidance
 Auto move to target.
 ~Scaling set to caster sensitivity.~
 Autocasts on colonists.

If there's any more you think I should add, let me know.

Haven't tested much for performance impact, but there shouldn't be too much. This only does its thing every 600 ticks. It checks all colony pawns for abilities, checks for valid targets, then schedules the cast job.
